chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers. For there is no power but of God: the powers that be are ordained of God.
items.plainText: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers. For there is no power but of God: the powers that be are ordained of God.

items.text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power, resisteth the ordinance of God: and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation.
items.plainText: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power, resisteth the ordinance of God: and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation.

items.text: For rulers are not a terror to good works, but to the evil. Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power? do that which is good, and thou shalt have praise of the same:
items.plainText: For rulers are not a terror to good works, but to the evil. Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power? do that which is good, and thou shalt have praise of the same:

items.text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is the minister of God, a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil.
items.plainText: For he is the minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is the minister of God, a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil.

items.text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject, not only for wrath, but also for conscience sake.
items.plainText: Wherefore ye must needs be subject, not only for wrath, but also for conscience sake.

items.text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also: for they are God's ministers, attending continually upon this very thing.
items.plainText: For for this cause pay ye tribute also: for they are God's ministers, attending continually upon this very thing.

items.text: Render therefore to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.
items.plainText: Render therefore to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.

items.text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another; for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.
items.plainText: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another; for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.

items.text: For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness, Thou shalt not covet; and if there be any other commandment, it is briefly comprehended in this saying, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
items.plainText: For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness, Thou shalt not covet; and if there be any other commandment, it is briefly comprehended in this saying, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

items.text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.
items.plainText: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.

items.text: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.
items.plainText: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.

items.text: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
items.plainText: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

items.text: Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying.
items.plainText: Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying.

items.text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
items.plainText: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
